title.description: Long title of the table / data. Example: "title": " "

description.description: Additional information and more detailed description. Example: "description": " "

spatial.description: Contains information about the spatial dimension

location.description: Data located at a certain location using the global reference system WGS84 in decimal notation. Example: "location": "52.43, 13.55"

resolution.description: Regular raster with a constant value. Example: "resolution": "100 m"

temporal.description: Contains information about the temporal dimension

reference_date.description: Particular year, month or day to which the data is recorded (ISO 8601). Example: "reference_date": "2017-01-01"

start.description: Marks the first entry of a time series. Follows the ISO 8601 format (<date>T<time>±<timezone>). Example: "start": "2017-01-01T00:00:00+01"

end.description: Marks the last entry of a time series. Follows the ISO 8601 format (<date>T<time>±<timezone>). Example: "end": "2017-12-31T23:00:00+01"

resolution.description: Temporal resolution indicates the time between two time steps in a time series. Example: "resolution": "1 h"

items.description: Source object in list of source objects. Each object has all name-value-pairs.

name.description: The name or title of the source. Example: "name": " "

description.description: A more detailed description of the source. Example: "description": " "

url.description: A link to the description and the download. Example: "url": " "

license.description: The full name of the license. Example: "license": " "

copyright.description: The copyright owner can be added. Some open licenses require mention of the copyright holder. Example: "copyright": "© Reiner Lemoine Institut"

license.description: Contains information about the data license

id.description: The license ID is a unique identifier published in the Open License Service (http://licenses.opendefinition.org/). Example: "id": "ODbL-1.0"

name.description: Full name of the license. Example: "name": " "

version.description: Specifies the versions of a license. Example: "version": "1.0"

url.description: A link to the full text of the license. Example: "url": " "

instruction.description: A short summary of the rights and obligations defined by the license (https://tldrlegal.com). Example: "instruction": "Share, Create, Adapt; Attribute"

copyright.description: Some open licenses require giving explicit credit to the author or copyright owner. Example: "copyright": " "

contributors.description: Contains significant changes (data set or metadata)

name.description: Full name or a synonym (user name). Example: "name": " "

email.description: The email address to contact a contributor. Example: "email": " "

date.description: The date of the contribution in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-TT). Example: "date": "2017-05-01"

comment.description: A comment field to shortly describe the contribution. Example: "comment": "Add license"

resources.description: Contains information about the tables or files

name.description: Name or path of the resource. Example: "name": "schema.table"

format.description: The (file) format of the resource. Example: "format": "PostgreSQL"

fields.description: Each field (column) of the table is described in detail. There are three sub keys: name, description, and unit for each column.

metadata_version.description: The metadata set has its own version number to identify which structure is used. Example: "metadata_version": "1.3"
